Package org.marc4j.helpers

This package contains helper classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RecordHandler Defines a set of Java callbacks to handle Record objects.
 

Class Summary
DefaultHandler Provides default implementations for the callbacks in the MarcHandler and ErrorHandler interface.
ErrorHandlerImpl Implements the ErrorHandler interface to report about warnings and errors that occur during the parsing of a MARC record.
RecordBuilder Creates record objects from MarcHandler events and reports events to the RecordHandler.
 

Package org.marc4j.helpers Description

This package contains helper classes.
